name: Counter Extermination
description:
Counter extermination is a fast-paced vehicle combat game in which you have to save the Earth from being destroyed by androids.

The Earth is being overrun by androids. It is your duty to stop as many of them as you can!

Controlls:

WASD - Movement

Left mouse button - Shoot

Right mouse button - Zoom in / lock onto enemies

Left shift - Speed boost

Q - Destroy current equipped turret

Tab - Pause

Space - Car horn (just in case you need it)


Assets used:

City Kit

Crosshair Pack

Road Kit

Sci-Fi Sounds

Nature Kit

Music

Car Tire Squeal

Interface Sounds
